responses.text:
**AI Writer (LaTeX-first)** ✍️

Craft academic-ready content with live LaTeX preview and collaboration.

**Highlights:**
• Real-time LaTeX rendering (KaTeX)
• Sections, tables, equations toolbar
• Collaborative editing with cursors
• AI assistance for abstracts, tables, and citations
• Split / full preview modes

**Great for:** literature reviews, method write-ups, tables, and formula-heavy drafts.
